sentence.Network_en: I know how to darn, and how to sew a button on.
Many women know how to carry out repairs on their cars.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多妇女懂得怎样修自己的车。

sentence.Network_en: I don't know how often I heard the same awful jokes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种千篇一律的烂笑话我不知道听过多少回了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这些资产既可以是物质资产，如存货、厂房和设备，又可以是知识或智力资产，如技术与技术诀窍（know-how），即无形资产。 20…
...now－Who）－管理性知识：（4）知道怎样做的知识（know－how）－技术性知识。
...道的多于我们所能表达的”清楚地表明了意会知识的内涵。意会知识包括信仰、隐喻、直觉、思维模式和所谓的“诀窍”(know-how)，其特点是：(1)无意识性，即意会知识的拥有者常常并没有意识到自己拥有的意会知识；(2)环境依赖性，.
专有技术（Know-how）又称为“技术秘密”、“技术诀窍”等，它是随着技术合同的大量涌现而在合同书上频繁使用的用语。从一般意义 …

list.abs: ...模式m2下的对象是同一个对象与对话双方事实上已经知道他们是同一个对象是两件不同的事情，这一区别就是“知道如何（know how）”和“知道怎样（know that）”的区别，研究前者是认知动力学要展开的工作，我们利用后者而不是前.
you know how to be silly ., 你知道怎样犯傻.

entry.tran: （尤指专业或实用的）技巧，技能
entry.def: Know-how is knowledge of the methods or techniques of doing something, especially something technical or practical.

example.ex: He hasn't got the know-how to run a farm.
example.tran: 他没有经营农场的专业知识。

means.word_mean: 1. the (technical) knowledge and skill required to do something

auth_sentence.content: But I know how fantastic Blackburn fans can be.
auth_sentence.res_content: But I know how fantastic Blackburn fans can be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But I know how fantastic Blackburn fans can be.

auth_sentence.content: Do any of you actually know how we evolve?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do any of you actually know how we evolve?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do any of you actually know how we evolve?

auth_sentence.content: Don't quite know how to respond to that.

sentences.en: They are almost totally dependent on Western know-how.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎完全依赖西方技术。

means.word_mean: 实际知识;技能;本事;窍门

sentences.en: He has decided to visit Japan with a view to enlarging his managerial know-how.
sentences.cn: 为了增进实际管理知识,他决定访问日本。

sentences.en: I don’t have much know-how about engines.
sentences.cn: 发动机方面的技术知识我知之甚少。
